item.description:
Celebrate the summer and join us for a Boston Harbor cruise. Watch the sunset and enjoy the beautiful Boston skyline. Enjoy 3 floors of entertainment with a large top deck for dancing under the stars. This year features DJ "Samuel L." spinning great top 40 dance music, live music on 2 decks, and FREE Airbrush Tattoos and Body Painting. Tix are currently $25 in advance. There is also a special discount running: 2 tix for $40. They also have free t-shirts for people who buy tickets in advance. Tix must be purchased in advance, to get your tix visit

http://www.bostoneventguide.com/beg.php?Clk=3187189

There is no ATM on board, so be sure to bring cash. We will meet outside the 7-11 Store which is next to the pier. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000. Cruise departs at 8pm. If you are late, please look for us on the boat. We will be on the Provincetown II, operated by Bay State Cruise Company.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet outside the 7-11 store at 7:30. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine, 774 232 0000.
item.name: Enjoy the summer night on a Boston Harbor Cruise. Tix Discount
